ygData.subject: Brief Intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Met all, My main is a 58 Barbarian Shamaness, followed by a 53 Wood Elf Druid, then a 50 Dark Elf Necromancer. I have 16 toons altogether. 2 accounts.
ygData.messageBody:
Well Met all,

My main is a 58 Barbarian Shamaness, followed by a 53 Wood Elf Druid,
then a 50 Dark Elf Necromancer. I have 16 toons altogether. 2
accounts.

Been playing 2 years, with long breaks within that time.

I grew up table-top roleplaying so EQ is a natural progression. I
love quests and sharing info with other players.

I play on an older machine (soon to change) so some zones/group
situations are frustrating for me.

Hope to share with u guys in the future!

May your mana be plentiful,
Witchbread
